topicSummary: Leukaemia Symptoms include pallor, bruising and infection.

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Haematological cancers - recognition and referral: Summary

latestChanges.title: Minor update
latestChanges.body: The National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE) quality standards for suspected cancer have been added to this topic.

latestChanges.title: Revised
latestChanges.body: This topic is a direct implementation of the National Institute for Health and Care Excellence guideline Suspected cancer: recognition and referral NICE, 2015. This CKS topic replaces the former topic on Haematological malignancy - suspected.
